page.title: 18MY WINTER
page.content: {HELEN ELDER 1BE The Winter starts when we have to give hay to the animals. We have a small holding with cows, goats and one sheep called "Ba Lam" who eats everything even the baby's nappies (my mum goes spare). We also have 3 horses. My Winter is not very horrible although cold, wet and snowy and its much better than living in a town. {JUSTIN LEWIS 1BE Our Winter is sometimes very cold and foggy and sometimes we even have snow. One Winter we even had snow as high as a wall and we used a spade to dig our way out of the house. On January 1st we go around singing in the streets. The younger children sing{"Calennig {calonnog. Rhai plant moen un ceiniog"} and the older ones{"Blwydd newydd dda i {chi ac i bawb sydd yn y ty".
